mapper.select: SELECT m.id menu_id, m.week, m.day, mm.id menu_meal_id, me.size, ml.name meal_name, d.name dish_name, dp.id dish_part_id, dp.part_code, dpf.id dish_part_food_id, f.cost, fl.name food_name, fn.NDB_No, fn.Nutr_No, fn.Nutr_Val, n.Tagname, fg.food_class FROM menu m, menu_meal mm, meal me, meal_lang ml, dish d, dish_part dp, dish_part_food dpf, food f, food_lang fl, sr28.nut_data fn, sr28.nutr_def n, food_group fg WHERE m.id = mm.menu_id AND mm.meal_id = me.id AND me.id = ml.meal_id AND mm.dish_id = d.id AND d.id = dp.dish_id AND dp.id = dpf.dish_part_id AND dpf.food_ndbno = f.ndbno AND f.ndbno = fl.food_ndbno AND f.ndbno = fn.NDB_No AND fn.Nutr_No = n.Nutr_No AND f.food_group_id = fg.id AND n.Tagname IN ('PROCNT', 'CHOCDF', 'FAT') AND ml.lang = #{lang} AND fl.lang = #{lang} AND m.coach_id = #{coach.id} AND m.diet_type_id = #{dietType.id} AND m.week = #{week} AND m.day = #{day} AND d.coach_id = #{coach.id} AND ( (#{mealCount} = 3 AND me.id IN (1, 3, 5)) OR (#{mealCount} = 4 AND me.id IN (1, 3, 4, 5)) OR (#{mealCount} = 5 AND me.id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5)) OR (#{mealCount} = 6 AND me.id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)) ) ORDER BY m.id, me.id, dpf.id
